#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
void factorial(int);

int main()
{
int a[100000],i,n;
scanf("%d",&n);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
scanf("%d",&a[i]);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
factorial(a[i]);
return 0;
}

void factorial( int n)
{
int i,j,q;
int temp1,temp2,temp3;
char *str;
double p=0.0;
for(i = 2; i <= n; i++)
{
      p += log10((double)i);
}
temp1=(int)p;
str=(char *)malloc((temp1+1) * sizeof(char));
if(str==NULL)
{
               exit(1);
}
str[0]=1;
for(i=1;i<temp1+1;i++)
str[i]=0;

 p = 0.0;
    for (j = 2; j <= n; j++)
    {
      p += log10((double)j);      
      temp2 = (int)p + 1;         
      q = 0;                   
      for (i = 0; i <= temp2; i++)
      {
        temp3 = (str[i] * j) + q;
        q = (temp3 / 10);
        str[i] = (char)(temp3 % 10);
      }
    }

printf("\n");
for( i = temp1 ; i >= 0; i--)
{
printf("%d",(int)str[i]);
}
free(str);
}
